fullText: Meaux Ecosystem Brand Guide - Edition: Formal Brand Book, Version: 1.1, Status: Canonical / Enforced. Meaux is an operating system for organizations. It exists to provide clarity, control, and continuity for organizations that must operate responsibly, transparently, and sustainably over long periods of time. Core brand attributes: Calm authority, Intentional restraint, Operational clarity, Durability, Human respect. Brand promise: Meaux provides organizations with systems to operate, communicate, design, automate, and grow—without fragmentation. Brand architecture: Meaux (master) → MeauxStack (internal) → MeauxCloud (public platform) → Modules (MeauxTalk, MeauxWork, MeauxSQL, MeauxCAD, MeauxMedia, MeauxIDE, MeauxOS). Visual identity prioritizes legibility over expression. Design exists to support understanding, not impress. Neutral backgrounds first, glass/clay effects only for hierarchy, no overpowering imagery, motion is minimal and purposeful. All Meaux applications are modules inside one OS. They do not exist independently. Brand governance checklist must pass for every new page, module, or domain. This Brand Book is enforceable. Deviation requires explicit approval. Meaux is built to last.
